string article = details.Replace(System.Environment.Newline, "<br />");

I want to replace only the new lines in content not between the tags..

URGENT help pleaes.. this is the only issue to be solved for me to go live

---

This is the first line.

This is the second line.

 <li>This is the first list item </li>
 <li>This is the second list item </li>

<table>
